sourceDesc.bibl: Part of the trial records of a witchcraft trial agains Hermann Buschorn and his wife Anna Harken, 1654. Located in Stadtarchiv Lemgo. Tektonik: 01.02.02. A - Rats- und Magistratsgericht - Hexenprozesse. v.num: 10106. Permalink: http://www.archive.nrw.de/LAV_NRW/jsp/findbuch.jsp?archivNr=292&verzguid=400292000017820000076

projectDesc.p: The aim of the edition was to provide a basic transcription of the texts and numbers. As the basic reserarch interest is in the distribution of costs of the trial most attention has been attributed to the salaries, professions and names. All personal Names (persName), all Professions (name type="profession"), all places (placeName), all Dates (date) and all amounts of money (measure) have been taged. The edition has avoided deeper (miss)interpretation and focused on a clear transkription. The reproduction of the content received priority over the recreation of the original layout. The three rows indicating the value of in Thl-Gl-D have been largely discarded and replaced by appropriate and standardized tagging.

samplingDecl.p: As the sallaries and costs are the main interest, a standardized way of noting them has been chosen. For example the tanscription 4,7,3, indicates the values in the colums of the table. The tag measure has therefore been specified with the unit "th-gl-d" it's quantity follows the same scheme "04073". Here, the first two integers corresponds to Taler (thl), the second two integers to Groschen (gl) and the last one to Pfennig (d). The exchange rate is: 1 Taler = 36 Groschen = 216 Pfennige

editorialDecl.p: The edition follows the notation of the original document. Abreviations on the end of words have been solved. Words or letters that could not be identified have been replaced by "..." wheres each dot represents a letter. Uncertain reading has been marked with cert=low.
